Didn't like the aim and shooting mechanics when i first started playing, still hate it now after 500 hours. Reason I stopped playing friends got a Legendary Eagle rank that is where try-hards are at and I was competent playing game at mediocre level MGE, rather not learn or increase mechanics for a game i don't enjoy/friends i can't play with as they only play ranked and their level is too sweaty.

O jogo é muito competitivo e isso é muito bom, porém pessoas com patente alta podem estragar as partidas de iniciantes usando contas smurfy.
